description: Campo Vivo produces, processes and distributes high quality organic products certified by the Mexican market.
Campoalto is an institution of Education for Work and Human Development that provides low income populations with high-quality training programs.
Capitaria provides timely information and a platform so that in one click people can take control of their investments and access the world’s markets.
Capture Higher Ed offers a path towards a smarter, more streamlined recruiting cycle through a machine learning-enabled analytics platform.
Caramba! is a marketing agency offering clients across the US and Latam consumer and trade promotions, shopper marketing activations, and loyalty programs for salesforce and distribution channels.
Carbon is a pan-African digital bank offering savings, current accounts, loans, insurance, and P2P transfers.
CardioDiagnostics is a medical technology company specialized in cardiac care solutions.
Carthage produces high-quality mediterranean, natural food and home goods, such as the Wax Wrap (plastic wrap alternative), primarily targeting the US and European markets.

CARTO is a Location Intelligence platform. Data Scientists, developers and analysts use CARTO to optimize their organization’s business processes and predict future outcomes. Using spatial data and analysis, they can improve the efficiency of delivery routes, better behavioral marketing, strategic store placements, and much more.
Casa do Construtor provides solutions for equipment rental in Brazil, including for construction, cleaning and gardening.
Cellulant is the leading electronic payment service in Africa, connecting customers with banks and utility services to create a more efficient payment ecosystem.
Centaur uses wireless IoT sensors to closely monitoring perishable products, reducing post-harvest losses during transportation and storage.
Founded by a former competitive racing driver, CEPA specializes in driver training and accident prevention consulting.
Cequens is a cloud communication platform that provides omni-channel communication APIs, enabling enterprises and developers to communicate with their customer base worldwide.
CERS provides massive online open courses taught by the most renowned teachers in Brazil.

Chazki improves the urban logistics and package delivery experience for e-commerce companies and customers. Its web and mobile platform enables the distribution of packages and real-time order tracking, increasing the speed of delivery.

CHB produces numerous products, such as juices, purees, juice blends and compounds, canned fruits, among others. Recently, CHB launched chilled, vitamin and organic juices under the brand of “ChrisFamily”.

Chef Burger is a Colombian burger chain that has redefined the burger experience in Colombia. Dedicated to bringing consumers together over a memorable experience, Chef Burger’s high quality and affordable burgers are served in rock-and-roll themed restaurants or food trucks.

Chef Seasons is an accredited global seasonings supplier to some of the world’s most recognizable fast food chains – Domino’s, Pizza Hut, Little Caesars, Burger King, Subway, Starbucks; and sells its award-winning products in thousands of stores under its own brand.

Chili is a comprehensive entertainment-centered marketplace for movie and TV fans, offering audiences the latest information and articles on upcoming films, geo-localized cinema ticket booking, and a catalog of thousands of first-release digital titles on-demand.
